display.title: Inside the Reactor: Fuel Control
description: The inside of the reactor is built up of pillars using several &&aFission Fuel Assembly&&r blocks, with a single &&aControl Rod Assembly&&r placed at the top of each pillar. These can be anywhere from 1 to 15 blocks in height, depending on the size of the reactor.
For this build, we'll put 2 of the Fission Fuel Assemblies in the center of our multiblock, and then put the Control Rod Assembly right on top of it.
